org.netbeans.spi.viewmodel

Interface TableHTMLModelFilter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Model

    public interface TableHTMLModelFilter
extends Model
    Use this to separate value and the HTML value. Implement this filter to override the behavior of any registered TableHTMLModels.
    Since:
    1.42
    See Also:
    TableHTMLModel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Registers given listener.
      String getHTMLValueAt(TableHTMLModel original, Object node, String columnID)
      Get the HTML value.

      Unregisters given listener.

    • Method Detail

      • hasHTMLValueAt

        boolean hasHTMLValueAt(TableHTMLModel original,
                       Object node,
                       String columnID)
                throws UnknownTypeException
        Test if the model has a HTML value. For backward compatibility, if it returns false, HTML value is is taken from the String value, if it contains some. If this is not desired, return true here and null from getHTMLValueAt(org.netbeans.spi.viewmodel.TableHTMLModel, java.lang.Object, java.lang.String).
        Parameters:
        original - The original TableHTMLModel
        node - an object returned from TreeModel.getChildren(java.lang.Object, int, int) for this row
        columnID - an id of column defined by ColumnModel.getID()
        Returns:
        true if there is some HTML value to be returned from getHTMLValueAt(org.netbeans.spi.viewmodel.TableHTMLModel, java.lang.Object, java.lang.String), false otherwise. When false is returned, getHTMLValueAt(org.netbeans.spi.viewmodel.TableHTMLModel, java.lang.Object, java.lang.String) is not called.
        Throws:
        UnknownTypeException - if there is nothing to be provided for the given parameter type

      • getHTMLValueAt

        String getHTMLValueAt(TableHTMLModel original,
                      Object node,
                      String columnID)
               throws UnknownTypeException
        Get the HTML value.
        Parameters:
        original - The original TableHTMLModel
        node - an object returned from TreeModel.getChildren(java.lang.Object, int, int) for this row
        columnID - an id of column defined by ColumnModel.getID()
        Returns:
        The HTML value, or null when no HTML value is provided.
        Throws:
        UnknownTypeException - if there is nothing to be provided for the given parameter type
        See Also:
        hasHTMLValueAt(org.netbeans.spi.viewmodel.TableHTMLModel, java.lang.Object, java.lang.String)

      • addModelListener

        Unregisters given listener.
        Parameters:
        l - the listener to remove
